trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Consente l'accesso programmatico all'elemento <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""> </xref> elemento sul server.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelect control to create a selection box.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il controllo HtmlSelect per creare una casella di selezione.

trans-unit.source: Specify item listings in the control by placing HTML `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Specificare elenchi di elementi nel controllo inserendo HTML `<option>` elementi tra l'apertura e chiusura `<select>` tag.

trans-unit.source: Each item is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Ogni elemento è rappresentato da un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing `<option>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare il testo visualizzato per ogni elemento nel controllo, è possibile impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà dell'elemento oppure inserire il testo tra i tag `<option>` tag.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text.
trans-unit.target: Impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà dell'elemento, è possibile associare un valore con l'elemento che è diverso dal testo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To select an item from the list by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare un elemento dall'elenco per impostazione predefinita, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà dell'elemento da `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of the HtmlSelect control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile controllare l'aspetto e il comportamento del controllo HtmlSelect impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property specifies the height (in rows) of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>proprietà specifica l'altezza (in righe) del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the HtmlSelect control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>proprietà specifica se più di un elemento può essere selezionato contemporaneamente nel controllo HtmlSelect.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the HtmlSelect control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il controllo HtmlSelect viene visualizzato come una casella di riepilogo a discesa.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se si consentono selezioni multiple (impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>proprietà `true`) o specificare un'altezza maggiore di una riga (impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>su un valore maggiore di `1`), il controllo viene visualizzato come una casella di riepilogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected item in a single-selection HtmlSelect control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare l'elemento selezionato in un controllo HtmlSelect a selezione singola, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>proprietà per ottenere l'indice dell'elemento selezionato.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile utilizzare questo valore per l'elemento da recuperare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an HtmlSelect control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare gli elementi selezionati da un controllo HtmlSelect che consenta di eseguire più selezioni, scorrere il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>insieme e verificare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà di ciascun elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelect class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: La classe HtmlSelect fornisce due proprietà per supportare l'associazione dati.

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Per associare dati a qualsiasi oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia (ad esempio <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interfaccia, usare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>proprietà per specificare l'origine dati da associare.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>proprietà, è necessario scrivere manualmente il codice per eseguire l'associazione dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind an HtmlSelect control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: Per associare automaticamente un controllo HtmlSelect a un'origine dati rappresentata da un controllo origine dati, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà e impostarne il valore il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>proprietà del controllo origine dati da utilizzare.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the HtmlSelect control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà, il controllo HtmlSelect viene associato automaticamente al controllo origine dati specificata.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, non è necessario chiamare in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of an item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile specificare campi nell'origine dati da associare al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà di un elemento nel controllo impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se l'origine dati contiene più origini dei dati, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>proprietà per specificare l'origine specifica da associare al controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se dispone di un <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>dell'oggetto con più tabelle, è necessario specificare la tabella da associare al controllo con il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlSelect, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di HtmlSelect, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare e inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente mostra il valore di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "select" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| La stringa letterale "select". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a parsed child control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un controllo figlio analizzato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method is used by ASP.NET to add parsed child controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddParsedSubObject viene utilizzato da ASP.NET per aggiungere controlli figlio analizzati per il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The parsed child control to add.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo figlio analizzato da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The child control specified by the obj parameter must be of the type .
trans-unit.target: Il controllo figlio specificato da di obj parametro deve essere di tipo .

trans-unit.source: Clears the list selection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of all items to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cancella la selezione nell'elenco di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo e imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà di tutti gli elementi di <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ClearSelection method iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ClearSelection scorre il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>insieme rappresentato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>proprietà e i set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>oggetto `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref> dell'oggetto per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control does not allow child controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo non consente controlli figlio.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> per contenere i controlli server figlio del controllo server corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il set di dati da associare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo da un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>proprietà con più set di dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sets of data, use the DataMember property to specify which set of data to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>proprietà contiene più set di dati, utilizzare la proprietà DataMember per specificare il set di dati da associare al controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use this property to indicate which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se dispone di un <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>con più tabelle, utilizzare questa proprietà per indicare la tabella da associare al controllo.</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source to bind to the control, you can then specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver specificato l'origine dati da associare al controllo, è possibile specificare i campi dall'origine dati da associare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>le proprietà di ogni elemento nel controllo impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Il set di dati da associare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo da un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>con più set di dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa vuota (""), che indica che la proprietà non è stata impostata.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property is set during the data-binding phase of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DataMember viene impostata durante la fase di associazione di dati di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of information to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'origine delle informazioni da associare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSource property to specify the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà origine dati per specificare l'origine dati da associare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un'origine dati deve essere una raccolta che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia (ad esempio <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interfaccia.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà DataSource, è necessario scrivere manualmente il codice per eseguire l'associazione dati.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which data set to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se l'origine dati contiene più set di dati, ad esempio un <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>con più tabelle, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>proprietà per specificare quale set di dati da associare al controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare i campi dall'origine dati da associare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>le proprietà di ogni elemento nel controllo impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà per associare automaticamente a un'origine dati rappresentata da un controllo origine dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*> method.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo richieda data binding e che viene specificato un controllo origine dati valido prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà, viene automaticamente associato i controllo elenco dati al controllo dell'origine dati specificata.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the EnsureDataBound method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando ASP.NET esegue l'associazione dati per il controllo, chiama il metodo EnsureDataBound per verificare che il controllo non è già stato associato a dati e che un'origine dati valida controllo che implementa il <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>interfaccia specificata per il relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo EnsureDataBound chiama quindi il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metodo per assicurarsi che il controllo è associato a dati immediatamente dopo la chiamata a questo metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object that represents the data source that is bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>oggetto che rappresenta l'origine dati a cui è associato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The GetData method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object independent of whether the data source was specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetData restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>oggetto indipendentemente che l'origine dati è stata specificata per il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the items listed in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta che contiene gli elementi elencati in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to manage the items listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la raccolta di elementi per gestire gli elementi elencati nel <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add items to, remove items from, and insert items into the collection.
trans-unit.target: A livello di codice, è possibile aggiungere elementi a, gli elementi da rimuovere e inserire gli elementi nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Items collection is commonly used to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di elementi viene comunemente utilizzata per scorrere gli elementi di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: For example, when multiple items are selected, you can iterate through the Items collection to determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando sono selezionati più elementi, è possibile scorrere la raccolta di elementi per determinare quali elementi sono selezionati.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks whether the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo verifica LoadPostData se i dati di postback di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo è diverso da quello precedente e in caso affermativo, restituisce `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `false`, indicating a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the LoadPostData method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>proprietà `false`, che indica un controllo a selezione singola <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo, quindi il metodo verifica LoadPostData il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the LoadPostData method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>proprietà `true`, che indica una selezione multipla <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo, quindi il metodo verifica LoadPostData il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo LoadPostData viene usato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli per estendere la funzionalità del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Ripristina il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> visualizzazione del controllo che richiesta di informazioni sullo stato da una pagina precedente salvata dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato principalmente dall'infrastruttura .NET Framework e non deve essere utilizzato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, gli sviluppatori di controlli possono eseguire l'override questo metodo per specificare come un controllo server personalizzato ripristina lo stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sulla gestione dello stato di ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>lo stato di visualizzazione del controllo viene archiviato come un <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>campo il <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>oggetto contiene i <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>stato di visualizzazione di base del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>campo di <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>oggetto contiene il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>insieme rappresentato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>campo di <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>oggetto contiene gli indici selezionati rappresentati dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to restore the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo LoadViewState chiama la classe di base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per il ripristino dello stato di visualizzazione di base del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo LoadViewState viene usato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli per estendere la funzionalità del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta lo stato del controllo da ripristinare.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è possono selezionare contemporaneamente in più elementi di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Multiple property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà più di specificare se più elementi possono essere selezionati contemporaneamente nel <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo viene visualizzato come una casella di riepilogo a discesa.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the Multiple property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se si consentono selezioni multiple (impostando la proprietà di più su `true`) o specificare un'altezza maggiore di una riga (impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>su un valore maggiore di `1`), il controllo viene visualizzato come una casella di riepilogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare gli elementi selezionati in un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>consentono selezioni multiple, scorrere il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>insieme e verificare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà di ciascun elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `multiple` attributo viene eseguito il rendering di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo solo se questa proprietà è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se più elementi possono essere selezionati contemporaneamente nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome di identificatore univoco associato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Name property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà Name per determinare il nome di identificatore univoco per un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: In questa implementazione, il `get` della funzione di accesso restituisce il valore della <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il `set` della funzione di accesso non assegna un valore per questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the Name property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `set` della funzione di accesso non assegna un valore per questa proprietà perché la proprietà Name deve avere lo stesso valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo funzioni correttamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di identificatore univoco associato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>evento viene generato quando l'associazione dei dati di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo invia una notifica al controllo di eseguire qualsiasi logica di associazione di dati che è associato.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the OnDataBinding method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, il metodo OnDataBinding crea il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>raccolta dall'origine dati specificata in uno di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>proprietà o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [NIB: generazione di un evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBinding method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnDataBinding consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property has changed.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnInit notifica il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controllo per eseguire le operazioni di inizializzazione necessari per creare e configurare un'istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>proprietà è `false` e <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>proprietà `true`, il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>
